original_text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,
korean_text: 연회장은 물로 된 포도주를 맛보고도 어디서 났는지 알지 못하되 물 떠온 하인들은 알더라 연회장이 신랑을 불러

sentences.original_text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water
and knew not whence it was
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 어디서 온 것인지 알지 못하였으나

sentences.original_text: but the servants which drew the water knew
the governor of the feast called the bridegroom
